work-item.field:
Lets combine these conditions with a map like the map we created before. We want to check who is older our mother or our father.
  • Add a new map $age and add their (father and mother) first names as key and their age as value.
  • Write conditions and check 
    • if they are at the same age
    • father is older than mother
    • mother is older than father
Example Image:
